items.title: This week’s top stories: iOS 26.3 now available, Siri roadblocks, and more
items.summary: Welcome to 9to5Mac’s top stories of the week, where we recap the biggest news in the Apple world every Saturday. items.title: Top Stories: iOS 26.3 Released, New Siri Snags, and More
items.summary:
Apple continued to keep users waiting for new hardware this week, as we've yet to see any of the significant product launches we're expecting to see in the first few months of the year.




News on the software side was a bit of a mixed bag this week, with iOS 26.3 and other updates finally seeing t

本周软件方面的消息好坏参半，iOS 26.3 和其他更新终于发布了。

The group talks through how and why this launch fell apart before discussing exactly what expectations we all sho

items.title: Are people updating to iOS 26? Here’s Apple’s official data
items.summary:
Apple has released the highly-anticipated adoption statistics for iOS 26 for the first time. The company says that 74% of all devices introduced in the last four years are running iOS 26, while 66% of all devices are running iOS 26.

These adoption numbers are based on iPhones and iPads that transacted on the App Store on February 12, 2026, according to Apple.

items.title: Apple says it is still on track to launch new Siri this year, as promised
items.summary:
Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman yesterday reported that Apple’s new Siri initiative was facing internal delays, having originally been planned to start rolling out with iOS 26.4. Gurman suggested features may start appearing in iOS 26.5, or later releases in the year.
That report has seemingly rocked invest

items.title: Apple will introduce these key Messages app upgrades very soon, here’s what they are
items.summary:
Last year, Apple confirmed that it’d be supporting end-to-end encryption with RCS in a future software update. At the time, iOS 18 was still the latest version of iOS – thus implying that the upgrade would come as part of the next round of software – iOS 26.
So far, end-to-end encryption is yet to s

items.title: Why Apple's iOS 26.4 Siri Upgrade Will Be Bigger Than Originally Promised

The iOS 26.4 version of ‌Siri‌ won't work like ChatGPT or Claude, but it will rely on large language models

items.title: New M5 Chips Spotted in iOS 26.3 Beta
items.summary:
The iOS 26.3 release candidate includes references to a pair of unreleased chips that are in the M5 family, according to information found by Nicolás Alvarez and shared with MacRumors.




The iOS 26.3 RC mentions two unreleased SoCs, T6051 and T6052, with associated H17C and H17D platform names. Th
items.title_translated: iOS 26.3 Beta 中发现新 M5 芯片
items.summary_translated:
根据 Nicolás Alvarez 发现并与 MacRumors 分享的信息，iOS 26.3 候选版本包含对 M5 系列中一对未发布芯片的引用。




iOS 26.3 RC 提到了两款未发布的 SoC：T6051 和 T6052，以及相关的 H17C 和 H17D 平台名称。钍

items.title: iOS 26.2.1 causing crashes, freezes, and severe battery drain for some
items.summary:
iOS 26.2.1 was released last week, adding support for AirTag 2, alongside bug fixes. However, a small minority of users are reporting that it has introduced bugs rather than removed them.
Among the problems being reported are apps crashing, freezing, or lagging; connectivity failures; and severe bat
items.title_translated: iOS 26.2.1 导致某些用户崩溃、死机和电池严重耗尽

报告的问题包括应用程序崩溃、冻结或滞后；连接失败；和严重的蝙蝠

Apple also released iOS 26.2.1 and watchOS 26.2.1 updates, and
items.title_translated: 这是苹果本周发布的所有产品

items.title: iOS 26’s new Messages feature got better when I changed this one setting

items.title: This iOS 26.3 feature is a sign of what’s to come for iPhone
items.summary:
With iOS 26.3, Apple is rolling out a new feature that lets you limit the information that cellular networks can use to determine your location. The twist, however, is that the feature is only supported on devices powered by Apple’s in-house modem.
I think what’s more interesting than this specific
items.title_translated: iOS 26.3 的这一功能预示着 iPhone 的未来
items.summary_translated:
在 iOS 26.3 中，Apple 推出了一项新功能，可让您限制蜂窝网络可用于确定您位置的信息。然而，不同的是，该功能仅支持由苹果内部调制解调器供电的设备。
我认为还有什么比这个具体更有趣的

items.title: iOS 26 Adoption Hits 50%, But Some Users Are Still Reluctant to Update
items.summary:
iOS 26 adoption now hovers at around 50%, according to StatCounter, but some users are still cautious about updating. 




New data published by SellCell provides a look at how users have responded to the push to update to ‌iOS 26‌. The findings are based on a January 2026 survey of 2,000 U.S.-based
items.title_translated: iOS 26 采用率达到 50%，但部分用户仍不愿更新
items.summary_translated:
根据 StatCounter 的数据，iOS 26 的采用率目前徘徊在 50% 左右，但一些用户仍然对更新持谨慎态度。 




SellCell 发布的新数据让我们了解了用户对更新至 iOS 26 的推动有何反应。该调查结果基于 2026 年 1 月对 2,000 名美国受访者进行的调查
